item.title: CVE-2024-1241|2024-04-23T03:52:34.318Z -- Watchdog -- Watchdog Antivirus
item.description: Watchdog Antivirus v1.6.415 is vulnerable to a Denial of Service vulnerability by triggering the 0x80002014 IOCTL code of the wsdk-driver.sys driver.
